item.title: （執筆中）【日次GDP】Earth Engineの衛星写真を使って景況感をナウキャスティングしてみる
item.description: #library(devtools) #install_github("JesJehle/earthEngineGrabR") library(earthEngineGrabR) #chirps_data <- ee_grab(data = ee_data_collection(datasetID = "UCSB-CHG/CHIRPS/DAILY", # spatialReducer = "mean", # temporalReducer = "sum", # timeStart = "2017-05-01", # timeEnd = "2017-05-31", # resolution = 200 # ), # targetArea = system.file("data/territories.shp", package = "earthEngineGrabR") # )
